name: fullstack-nest-app
description: A full-stack NestJS application with client and shared code in a monorepo.
author: Your Name

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.start:dev: npm run build:shared && npm run start:server & npm run start:client
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=server && npm run lint --workspace=client
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=server && npm run test --workspace=client
